T11bsa059_u:0: Dharmakīrtipraṇītā Santānāntarasiddhiḥ buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svadehe 'nyatra tadgrahāt
T11bsa059_u:2: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta, cittamātre 'pyaṣa nayaḥ samaḥ /
T11bsa059_u:4: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam
T11bsa059_u:5: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet?
T11bsa059_u:6: na; tulyatvāt paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate /
T11bsa059_u:7: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet /
T11bsa059_u:13: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete /
T11bsa059_u:14: animitte eva bahirmukhapratibhāsinīti kinneṣyate cet? animittatve sarvasyānimittatvaṃ prasajyeta
T11bsa059_u:18: sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati
T11bsa059_u:22: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate /
T11bsa059_u:23: tatra yadi kasyacidpūrvakatvam, na ko 'pi tatpūrvakaḥ syāt, viśeṣābhāvāt /
T11bsa059_u:25: tatra yathā kriyāmupalabhya, ātmani spandanānupalambhādanyatra spandanapratītiḥ; tathā kriyāpratibhāsopalambhane 'pi /
T11bsa059_u:27: parakriyābhilāpayornimittaṃ nāstīti kinnecchati? tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
T11bsa059_u:32: paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyābhilāpau spandananimittakāviti kinna vadati? tayorabhāvāditi cet /
T11bsa059_u:33: tathopalabdhisāpyāt kinna staḥ? atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya
T11bsa059_u:36: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet /
T11bsa059_u:38: samāśriyeta, tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
T11bsa059_u:39: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
T11bsa059_u:41: kadācit svapne 'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva; devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ satyasvapnadarśanāt
T11bsa059_u:43: tāvattayā kriyayāpi taccittaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate? cittasya kāryatvāt /
T11bsa059_u:44: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate? api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet, tadānupalabhyamānenāpi syāttathā pratipattiḥ /
T11bsa059_u:46: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā, kriyātaḥ jñānam, jñānāt tasya pratipattiriti
T11bsa059_u:49: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ /
T11bsa059_u:53: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
T11bsa059_u:54: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate: na tvatyantāsadābhogāt /
T11bsa059_u:56: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
T11bsa059_u:60: bhrāntyavasthānāṃ kriyaiva na bhavati, arthaśūnyajñānodayānna doṣaḥ /
T11bsa059_u:61: sarvaprakāravyapadeśasāmyāt kadācijjñānamarthaśūnyam, anyadānyathā ityeṣo 'dhikāraḥ kuto labdhaḥ? atha middhādināvasthānyathābhāvaścet /
T11bsa059_u:64: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
T11bsa059_u:65: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
T11bsa059_u:68: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
T11bsa059_u:79: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna? viṣayīkaraṇe 'rthāntaraṃ syāt /
T11bsa059_u:80: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate? tatsvarūpājñāne tatsiddhairasambhavāditi cet 3? eṣa prasaṅgo 'pi samaḥ /
T11bsa059_u:81: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
T11bsa059_u:82: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham? [65-67]
T11bsa059_u:83: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet? kiñca tatsāmānyaṃ paracittam evānyadvāhosvidavācyam
T11bsa059_u:84: anyatvāvācyatvayorekatve tvanena tatsāmānyameva gṛhyeta, na paracittam /
T11bsa059_u:85: tatkathamanena tad gamyate? nāpi sāmānyaṃ paracittameva /
T11bsa059_u:86: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam /
T11bsa059_u:95: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ /
T11bsa059_u:100: na tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ yujyate, tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ
T11bsa059_u:102: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate
T11bsa059_u:106: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi
T11bsa059_u:108: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate /
T11bsa059_u:110: sākṣāt paracittavidāṃ tu katham? yadi te paracittasya svarūpaṃ
T11bsa059_u:112: atha na jānanti, kathaṃ te sākṣādvidaḥ? kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca
T11bsa059_u:113: / atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti cet? aprahīṇagrāhyagrāhaka vikalpayogināṃ paracittajñānamapi vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam,
T11bsa059_u:115: yogabalāddhi teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paracittākāraviśeṣānukāri sphuṭābhamupajāyate, karmadevādyadhiṣṭhānabalāt satyasvapnadarśanavat /
